title: Dancing Peasant Woman
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
description: Woman in colorfully-patterned peasant costume with kerchief on head, in dance pose with right arm bent out and hand resting on hip, the left bent with hand on chest; standing on small circular base.
name: Figure
